snippet: Eyeing a lucrative sales market, Mayor R. T. Rybak of Minneapolis is urging same-sex couples to wed in his city.
abstract: Editorial praises Minneapolis Mayor R T Rybak for traveling the Midwest and inviting gay and lesbian couples in areas without legal same-sex marriage to visit his city and get married; says while Rybak is also drawing people to his city in order to boost its tax coffers and hospitality industry, it still is refreshing to see marriage equality evolve along a rocky political road.
lead_paragraph: Eyeing a lucrative sales market, Mayor R. T. Rybak of Minneapolis is urging same-sex couples to wed in his city.

headline.main: Seeking the Riches of Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Seeking the Riches of Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
